questions.question_text: A monitoring tool notification of a notable occurrence is known as what?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Same as others, it should be B only. 
Reason is in the question stated: "A monitoring tool", i.e. those occurrences from external before SN create Alert.
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-operations-management/page/product/event-management/task/t_EMManageEvent.html

Selected Answer: B
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-operations-management/page/product/event-management/task/t_EMManageEvent.html

Event Management tracks individual events to manage external systems. These events are notifications from monitoring tools indicating occurrences of interest, like log messages, warnings, or errors.

Selected Answer: B
Event Management tracks individual events to manage external systems. These events are notifications from monitoring tools indicating occurrences of interest, like log messages, warnings or errors.

Only Event.

choices.A: Source, DNS, Node, Additional info, Metric Name
choices.B: Source, Type, Node, Resource, Metric Name
choices.C: Source, Type, DNS, Additional info, Metric Name
choices.D: Source, Source Instance, Node, Type, Resource

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-operations-management/page/product/event-management/concept/c_EMEventIdentifier.html

questions.question_text: If a Message Key is not provided, which fields are concatenated to make our own?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is the correct one
If there is 5 nodes, 100% / 5 = 20%, this is the influence of each node.
When setting the influence to 45, it requires 3 node to exceed 45 (i.e. 20 x 3 = 60) in order to show impact

Selected Answer: D
Considering 5 nodes in cluster each has 20% influence. 100 / 5 = 20.
So to exceed 45, it needs 3 nodes impacted. 20+20+20 = 60 > 45.

questions.question_text: A load balanced web application has a cluster of 5 Apache nodes. When considering impact calculation with application cluster member rule influence set to 45, how many impacted nodes within that cluster would cause the overall application service to have a degradation of service?
A Service is not viewable in Operator Workspace. What could be the issue?

choices.A: The service is a manual service
choices.C: The service was created through Service Mapping
choices.B: The service is not set to operational
choices.D: The service is a technical service

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct

questions.question_text: What ServiceNow feature is an aid to rapid implementation of your Event Management and Operational Intelligence features?

discussion.content:

D is correct
